translator.translatorname: Kazuki Zaamen Kuri no Hana band score

lyric.verse: E, imama yo hajimosute saran Anta hodo no otoko nado oranu Moesakaru yoo tsume tokenikeri Anta dake wa ubawaretakunai
lyric.chorus: Onegai doko ni mo yukanaide yo Nee goshoo dakara soba ni oite yo
lyric.verse: E, imama yo kami nobinikiri Anta yue no otome gogorosa Doo demo yoroshi tsumaru tokoro wa Anta no me de ubawaretano sa
lyric.chorus: Onegai dare ni mo iwanai de yo Nee goshoo dakara himitsu ni shite yo
lyric.verse: Donna serifu no kooryoku ni maitta tsumori mo nai wa Onna no watashi no shinjitakya damatte tsuite koi E, imama yo mawarikudoi zonamoshi Konna koto ni moo kuchi wa hatsuka wanu
